channel.description: Recent content in robotics on Richard Gao's Portfolio

item.title: Follow the Leader
item.description: Follow the leader behavior for a decentralized robotic swarm using fuzzy logic

item.description: Robot behavior to hide in shadows using the MTMT Shadow Detection Model

item.description: Solving the robot localization problem using a particle filter

item.title: Exploring Behavior Based Robotics
item.description: Robotic boat that hunts and follows a target while avoiding obstacles

item.description: 3D printed 8-DoF robot that tracks and mimics your every move

item.description: Using gradient descent to control a differential wheeled robot to a goal

item.title: Text to Portrait
item.description: Using a UR5 robotic arm to draw images from the internet
